org.mantisbt.connect.text
Class StringCustomFieldFormat

java.lang.Object
  org.mantisbt.connect.text.CustomFieldFormat
      org.mantisbt.connect.text.StringCustomFieldFormat
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICustomFieldFormat
public class StringCustomFieldFormat
extends CustomFieldFormat

Use objects of this type for Custom Fields of type String, Numeric, Float and Email.

Author:
Peter Lanser, planser@users.sourceforge.net

public StringCustomFieldFormat(ICustomFieldDefinition definition)
Method Detail

format

public java.lang.String format(java.lang.Object object)
                        throws CustomFieldFormatException

Evaluated restrictions are Minimum Length, Maximum Length and Allowed Values.

Parameters:
object - Must be an object of type java.lang.String.
Returns:
The unmodified parameter object.
Throws:
CustomFieldFormatException - This exception is thrown if the value doesn't fulfill certain restrictions (e.g. minimum length, maximum length, allowed values etc.). It depends on the concrete type which restrictions are checked.

parse

public java.lang.Object parse(java.lang.String string)
                       throws CustomFieldFormatException
Description copied from interface: ICustomFieldFormat

Parses a value which comes in Mantis-Format and transforms it into an appropriate Java-Object.

Returns:
An object of type java.lang.String (the unmodified parameter string).
Throws:
CustomFieldFormatException - This exception is thrown if an error occurres while the transformation.
